description: Returns a list of compliant and noncompliant rules with the number of resources for compliant and noncompliant rules. Does not display rules that do not have compliance results.

parameters.name: ConfigurationAggregatorName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration aggregator.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters the results by ConfigRuleComplianceFilters object. ConfigRuleName (string) --- The name of the Config rule. ComplianceType (string) --- The rule compliance status. For the ConfigRuleComplianceFilters data type, Config supports only COMPLIANT and NON_COMPLIANT. Config does not support the NOT_APPLICABLE and the INSUFFICIENT_DATA values. AccountId (string) --- The 12-digit account ID of the source account. AwsRegion (string) --- The source region where the data is aggregated.

nested_params.name: ConfigRuleName
nested_params.description: The name of the Config rule.

nested_params.name: ComplianceType
nested_params.description: The rule compliance status. For the ConfigRuleComplianceFilters data type, Config supports only COMPLIANT and NON_COMPLIANT. Config does not support the NOT_APPLICABLE and the INSUFFICIENT_DATA values.

nested_params.name: AccountId
nested_params.description: The 12-digit account ID of the source account.

nested_params.name: AwsRegion
nested_params.description: The source region where the data is aggregated.

nested_items.name: AggregateComplianceByConfigRules
nested_items.description: Returns a list of AggregateComplianceByConfigRule object.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the Config rule.

nested_items.name: Compliance
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an Amazon Web Services resource or Config rule is compliant and provides the number of contributors that affect the compliance.

nested_items.name: ComplianceType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an Amazon Web Services resource or Config rule is compliant.

nested_items.name: ComplianceContributorCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules that cause a result of NON_COMPLIANT, up to a maximum number.

nested_items.name: CappedCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules responsible for the current compliance of the item.

nested_items.name: CapExceeded
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the maximum count is reached.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The 12-digit account ID of the source account.

nested_items.name: AwsRegion
nested_items.description: The source region from where the data is aggregated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
